name: Tree for Money
description:
Plant trees to get rewards

Do you want to grow your own tree and get rewards?
If you plant a tree and plant beautiful green fruit in a tree planting application, you can feel the joy of rewarding.

You can grow plants by tapping vigorously in the game like a real capitalist get more rewards.
Keep your pockets full of fun and nurture the world's richest fruit in the tree planting app!

In the process of planting tree, you can also use rain props or fertilize to make the plants grow faster.

Drop everything that bothers you, start a tree that belongs to you! Make nature more expensive, and let you in the game rich growth!

Are you ready to build your own tree?
